marklogic.body:
(PC) - Jeep horns make players directly in front of the driver twitch from pain. Don't fix it, it doesn't interfere with gameplay at all. I'm just reporting it because it's funny. :D Here's the video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NaRRKjqr99Q
- Flares don't seem to distract javelin missiles. It happened to me several times when piloting Venom in Caspian Border Rush.
- When deploying certain gadgets (I've tried this with SOFLAM and Spawn Beacon so far) on objects (tried white bricks lying around the airfield on Wake Island) they sometimes Vanish when placed in certain Spots. I'll try to post a video of that later if I can.
- When entering a mortar, you fire first shot automatically, without pressing the "fire" button.
